clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Patient Concerns and Treatment Satisfaction in Patients Being Treated With Finacea Foam for Rosacea
clinical_study.official_title: A Study of Patient Concerns and Treatment Satisfaction in Patients Being Treated With Finacea Foam for Rosacea

brief_summary.textblock: To survey rosacea patients about their concerns, treatment satisfaction, and quality of life associated with their Finacea Foam treatment

primary_outcome.time_frame: one-time survey in 2 week recruitment window
primary_outcome.description: Collected patient demographics and characteristics are : Year of birth Gender Insurance type

primary_outcome.time_frame: one-time survey in 2 week recruitment window
primary_outcome.description: Patient reported history of the following will be collected : Blepharitis Conjunctivitis Corneal neovascularization/keratitis Depression Migraine

primary_outcome.time_frame: one-time survey in 2 week recruitment window
primary_outcome.description: Patient reported diagnosis of the following will be collected: Erythematotelangiectatic (facial redness) Papulopustular (bumps and pimples) Phymatous (enlargement of the nose) Ocular (eye irritation)

primary_outcome.measure: Past use of topical rosacea treatments
primary_outcome.time_frame: one-time survey in 2 week recruitment window
primary_outcome.description: Patient reported use of the following medications will be collected: Metronidazole gel Metronidazole cream Metronidazole lotion Metronidazole emulsion Brimonidine tartrate gel

primary_outcome.measure: Patient concerns collected by Rosacea Treatment Preference Questionnaire
primary_outcome.time_frame: one-time survey in 2 week recruitment window
primary_outcome.description: Rosacea Treatment Preference Questionnaire is a survey to assess patient self-reported rosacea subtype and severity, and to evaluate the concerns that contribute to patient satisfaction/dissatisfaction, as well as treatment decisions with rosacea topical treatments

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment satisfaction assessed by Satisfaction with Medicines Questionnaire (SATMED-Q)
primary_outcome.time_frame: one-time survey in 2 week recruitment window
primary_outcome.description: SATMED-Q is a 17-question, validated, multidimensional generic questionnaire designed for use in patients with any chronic disease treated with medicines

primary_outcome.measure: Quality of life measured by Dermatology Life Quality Index (DLQI)
primary_outcome.time_frame: one-time survey in 2 week recruitment window
primary_outcome.description: DLQI is a widely used dermatology-related quality of life tool

arm_group.description: Patients diagnosed with rosacea and currently receiving topical monotherapy with Finacea Foam

intervention.description: Finacea Foam, Active substance Azelaic acid

study_pop.textblock: Patients diagnosed with rosacea and currently receiving topical monotherapy with Finacea Foam

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- At least 18 years of age
- Diagnosis of rosacea by a medical professional
- Currently using Finacea Foam as topical monotherapy for rosacea
- Willing and able to provide voluntary, informed consent to participate in this study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Use of any other topical treatment for rosacea at the time of enrollment
